name: Fireside (DominiqueTV)
description:
Social virtual reality campfire experience with listening spots and a guided meditation spot, to meet people and connect with community. Built for Quest and Quest 2 with Link cable, and Rift S.

Made by the Eunoia Collab:
Dane Willacker (DangerDano)
Tahmina Khanam (Tanu Luna)
John Howard (Cyrnus)
David Donnell (PandaAxolotl)
Dominique Teresa Vyborna (DominiqueTV)
Chelsie Harrison (Heilexcs)
